subject: Football
Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
lead_paragraph: Many college football rivalries are conducted with a religious fervor, but when Utah and B.Y.U. play, as they will on Saturday, the fervor has religion in its roots.
snippet: Many college football rivalries are conducted with a religious fervor, but when Utah and B.Y.U. play, as they will on Saturday, the fervor has religion in its roots.
